DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Antiretroviral Drug-Drug Interaction Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Nonsmoking subject Ages 18 50 year Inclusive body mass index 18.0 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive Women childbearing potential Must agree follow instruction method contraception duration study plus 34 day posttreatment completion Any history acute chronic medical surgical illness Personal family history hemophilia A B Other protocol define exclusion criterion could apply
